original_text: And he hath cast the lot for them, and his hand hath divided it unto them by line: they shall possess it for ever, from generation to generation shall they dwell therein.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그것들을 위하여 제비를 뽑으시며 그의 손으로 줄을 띠어 그 땅을 그것들에게 나누어 주셨으니 그들이 영원히 차지하며 대대로 거기에 살리라

sentences.original_text: And he hath cast the lot for them
and his hand hath divided it unto them by line
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손이 줄로 그것을 그들에게 나누어 주었으며

sentences.original_text: they shall possess it for ever
from generation to generation shall they dwell therein
